alert.note: Alert for Leadville Vicinity, Lake County Below 11000 Ft; Western Chaffee County Between 9000 and 11000 Ft; Western Mosquito Range, East Lake County Above 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 27 at 3:33AM MST until December 28 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph causing blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Lake County Below 11000 Feet, Western Mosquito Range and East Lake County Above 11000 Feet and Western Chaffee County Between 9000 and 11000 Feet Counties. * WHEN...Until 8 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
